question: Is there anything wrong to cut / remove nails, hairs of the head or unwanted hairs at night times. i.e after isha and before fajr (subh)?
answer:
QUESTION

Is there anything wrong to cut / remove nails, hairs of the head or unwanted hairs at night times. i.e after isha and before fajr (subh)?

Jazakumullah Khair for this great online fatwa resource entity.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

There is nothing wrong in Shariah in clipping nails and removing unwanted hair at nights and before fajr.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
